contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Australian place | type = lga | name = Rural City of Benalla | state = vic | image = Australia Victoria Benalla RC locator map.svg | caption = Location in Victoria | pop = {{formatnum:14208}} | pop_footnotes = (2009)<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.abs.gov.au/ausstats/abs@.nsf/Latestproducts/3218.0Main%20Features52008-09?opendocument&tabname=Summary&prodno=3218.0&issue=2008-09&num=&view=|title=Regional Population Growth, Australia, 2008â€“09|author=Australian Bureau of Statistics|date=30 March 2010|accessdate=3 June 2010}}</ref> | area = | est = 2002 <!--I would guess from information below.--> | seat = [[Benalla, Victoria|Benalla]] | mayor = Barbara Alexander AO | region = | logo = Benalla ruralcity logo.png | url = [http://www.benalla.vic.gov.au www.benalla.vic.gov.au] | stategov = | fedgov = | near-nw = [[Shire of Campaspe|Campaspe]] | near-n = [[Shire of Moira|Moira]] | near-ne = [[Rural City of Wangaratta|Wangaratta]] | near-w = [[City of Greater Shepparton|Greater Shepparton]] | near-e = [[Rural City of Wangaratta|Wangaratta]] | near-sw = [[Shire of Strathbogie|Strathbogie]] | near-s = [[Shire of Mansfield|Mansfield]] | near-se = [[Rural City of Wangaratta|Wangaratta]] }} The '''Rural City of Benalla''' is a [[Local government areas of Victoria|local government area]] in [[Victoria, Australia]] in the north-eastern part of the state. It has a population of 13,523<ref name=ABSpop>{{census 2006 AUS |name=Benalla (RC) (Local Government Area)|id=LGA21010|quick=on|accessdate=22 December 2009}}</ref> and an area of 235,059 [[hectare|ha]]. It was formed in 2002 from the demalgamation of the [[Shire of Delatite]]. ==Wards== *Churchill *Dunlop *Islands *Lake Benalla *Lake Mokoan *Mt Samaria *Winton Each ward is represented by one elected councillor.<ref name = "council">{{Cite web | last = Local Government Victoria | title = Rural City of Benalla Council | url = http://www.localgovernment.vic.gov.au/web20/dvclgv.nsf/AllDocs/CF0FC9D391088A1FCA257161001D38B4?OpenDocument | accessdate = 2008-10-30 | postscript = <!--None--> }}</ref> ==See also== * [[Benalla, Victoria|Benalla]] * [[List of localities (Victoria)]] ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.benalla.vic.gov.au/ Rural City of Benalla official website] *[http://www.metlinkmelbourne.com.au/location/view/62 Metlink local public transport map] *[http://services.land.vic.gov.au/landchannel/jsp/map/InteractiveMapIntro.jsp Link to Land Victoria interactive maps] {{Local Government Areas of Victoria}} {{coord|36|33|00|S|145|58|00|E|type:adm2nd_region:AU-VIC|display=title}} [[Category:Local Government Areas of Victoria (Australia)|Benalla, Rural City of]] {{Australia-gov-stub}}
